import _objectSpread from"/Users/tola/Downloads/Elites/elitesDemo/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{firebase_app}from'../data/config';import user from'../assets/images/user/user.png';var db=firebase_app.firestore();export var createUser=function createUser(value,avatar){db.collection('contactApp').add({avatar:avatar?avatar:user,name:value.name,surname:value.surname,mobile:value.mobile,age:value.age,nameToSearch:value.name.toLowerCase()});};export var deletedUser=function deletedUser(userId){return firebase_app.firestore().collection('contactApp').doc(userId).delete();};export var editUser=function editUser(value,url,userId){db.collection('contactApp').doc(userId).set({avatar:url?url:null,name:value.name,surname:value.surname,mobile:value.mobile,age:value.age,nameToSearch:value.name.toLowerCase()});};export var getAge=function getAge(min,max){db.collection("contactApp").where('age','>=',min).where('age','<=',max).onSnapshot(function(snapshot){// eslint-disable-next-line
var getUser=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){return _objectSpread({id:doc.id},doc.data());});});};
